resources.string: This is the instruction of My GPS APP:

App Guidelines:

- Change Font Size: Change the size of the font being used to display information.

- Unit Change: Change the units of the speed.

- Pause/Resume: Pause/Resume the Display and Updates data of GPS and Speed.

- Simulate: “ An alternate mode ” where location updates are provided not from GPS, but rather from a synthetic (i.e., fake) source traveling 10 miles per hour.

- HELP: Display the helpful information showing how to use the APP.

Attributes:

•GPS: Current/Simulate Relative (Longitude, Latitude) of the phone.

•Speed: Current/Simulate Speed of the phone.

•Color Change: According to the speed being traveled, Different color will be applied ,

•RETURN: Click the "RETURN" Button back to Main Page.
